Dataset brief description: This dataset is about all the  theaters in Madrid, information extracted from datos.gob.es, concretely from the list https://datos.gob.es/es/catalogo/l01280796-salas-de-espectaculos-artisticos-teatros-cines-filmotecas-auditorios-y-salas-de-conciertos1 and its in RDF-XML format, I have used the Google's Dataset Search engine, link at https://toolbox.google.com/datasetsearch/search?query=Madrid%20rdf&docid=zuGn%2FeTyjTHCIriPAAAAAA%3D%3D
